abstract: Barry C. Silk writes puzzles for grown-ups, but once in a while you can find stuff for less mature adults like me.
snippet: Barry C. Silk writes puzzles for grown-ups, but once in a while you can find stuff for less mature adults like me.
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY PUZZLE — Barry C. Silk writes puzzles for grown-ups — tough yet elegant grids filled with lots of scientific and political entries — but if you look carefully, there are always a few entries that remind us that, no matter how old you are, the kid in us remains.
